column4: can nobody tell me, where i can find the checksum for the Ubuntu Gutsy DVD iso? Cant find it on ubuntu.com
where did you dl it from?
I dont think they did a dvd release this time, according to this: http://releases.ubuntu.com/7.10/
Ahh... There you go. Ubot inadvertantl linked to it. Why the hell they didnt put the dvd and cd checksums on the same page is beyond me, and http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/releases/7.04/release/
